    Measuring Defensive Interactions

    15 Feb 2020

    • Football
    • #Methodology
    • #R

    Used tracking data to quantify off ball defensive activity, possibly one of the first methods to do so.

    This method was:

    • Presented at the Stats Preform Pro Forum 2021
    • Covered on a Friends of Tracking talk
    • Covered in an article in SpaceSpaceSpace
    • Covered in an article in Analytics FC Blog
